reviewsJson.markdown:
**RDA**/ Velocity

 **% Used**/ 2.5

**Coil**/ Clapton **W**/ 45 

**Steep Time**/3 weeks **Wicking**/ Full      

**PG/VG** 50/50 **Nic%** 0    

**Mouth Feel** - Light on the palate and nose,  moderately dense I would give it a 4 out of 10. Moderate throat hit.                      
 
**Flavor Properties**- Raw coconut with out the natural sweetness or sugars found in coconut.

**Relatable Flavors** - Something like chewing on a raw piece of coconut husk and all.

**Off Flavors** - Extremely Floral and as mentioned before a little husky. ( I'm sure I'll get told I'm testing at too high of a % going to try it at 1.25 )

**Position In The Recipe** - Should make a decent accent, or top note or pair with a sweeter coconut like Flavor Arts should round out for a very realistic coconut.

**Pairings** - Other coconuts, chocolates, fruits, tobacco's, and given its extremely Floral taste I'm thinking a few tea flavorings would work really well.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Coconut
